mapper.insert:
SELECT manias_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO manias(no, id, password, nickname, profile, regdate) VALUES(#{no}, #{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{profile}, systimestamp)
mapper.select: SELECT no, id, password, nickname, profile, regdate FROM(SELECT no, id, password, nickname, profile, regdate, rownum r FROM(SELECT no, id, password, nickname, profile, regdate FROM manias ORDER BY 1 DESC)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
